name: Boucolus, Bishop of Smyrna
hieromartyr Sylvanus, Bishop of Emessa and those with him
troparia: (Tone 4) The truth of your deeds made you for your flock a rule of faith* and an image of meekness,* a teacher of continence.* And so you gained the heights through humility,* riches through poverty,* father Boucolus.* Intercede with Christ our God** for the salvation of our souls.
